title: Bloomberg Markets: Dave Wilson's Stock of the Day for Oct. 19
itunes:title: Bloomberg Markets: Dave Wilson's Stock of the Day for Oct. 19
description:
Bloomberg Markets with Carol Massar and Cory Johnson.\u0010\u0010GUEST:\u0010David Wilson\u0010Stocks Editor\u0010Bloomberg News\u0010Discussing his "Stock of the Day"Heritage-Crystal Clean (HCCI). Heritage-Crystal Clean Inc.'s shares fell as much as 21 percent in response to disappointing third-quarter results. Earnings and revenue at the parts-cleaning company trailed analysts' average estimates in a Bloomberg survey for the fourth time in the past five quarters. Heritage-Crystal Clean attributed the shortfall to higher labor costs, among other things.

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
